translations: n．怨恨，愤恨：对某人或某事的不满、愤怒或敌意，通常是因为认为自己受到了不公平的待遇。
· He harbored deep resentments against his boss.
他对他的老板怀有深深的怨恨。

sentences.sentence: It might be worth taking a long hard look at your frustrations and resentments.
sentences.translation: 也许值得对你的挫折感与愤懑做仔细的分析。

sentences.sentence: A New Year looks sure to entrench old resentments.
sentences.translation: 新的一年，旧有的愤恨还将根深蒂固。
